TopicTitle: oh god why can i not stop laughing

Articles.Content:
Can't stop laughing

Please make this a promo ad for KSP (protip: this suggestion is not serious)

Warning: Profanity may occur during the viewing of the above video

Edited October 8, 2012 by whatisthisidonteven
I think the excessive use of profanity kind of rules that out...
Am I the only one who fails to see any humor in this?

Am I the only one who fails to see any humor in this?

Don't worry, I also don't see the humour in this.
Any chance of a profanity warning on that link whatisthisidonteven?
Reminds me of one of those stupid MLG call of duty montage videos. I'm so glad nobody makes those anymore....

Strongly reminded me of (WARNING! PROFATINTY ON SCREEN! LAUGHTER-INDUCED SPLEEN RUPTURES MAY OCCUR!)

.

I can see the humor
I think that just gave me a seizure

I think that just gave me a seizure

Yeah. I felt like all the epileptic dogs at the end of the Flight of the Conchords song where they do "the remix" for the Epileptic Dogs tribute song and give all the dogs seizures.

That was awesome. Here's the joke for those who don't get it. First this is a play on Call of Duty and Battlefield 3 'skill' videos which usually feature dubstep and all the camera spins and junk you see in the video. It's become a MASSIVE CLICHE to the point where people parody it.

Second, lithobraking is hilarious and very KSP.
HAhAAHAhsdfc this is great

Lol nice.

For any of you wondering, this is one of the most iconic videos that sparked this fad:

Reminds me of one of those stupid MLG call of duty montage videos. I'm so glad nobody makes those anymore....

That's what it's making fun of.

Any chance of a profanity warning on that link whatisthisidonteven?

Sure.

Nerdy rocket science gaming community meets internet community.

Things are getting interesting.

And oh yeah - it's funny. I'd say it could do without the profanity but then it wouldn't be the same thing i think.
Well thats hilarious!
That was a rude video.
Made me laugh a little bit.
Dubstep + Profanity + Filter overuse is a sort of humor some people love to use, i didn't fail to see the fun in it, but.. meh.

It was alright I guess, I smiled, but not the funniest example of the meme I've come across.

The point of the parody is to use shall we say, shoddily made, dull subject matter -type games. I don't think KSP has that kind of image, at least I hope not.

Anyway unless it's better than the farming simulator one (disclaimer if you go searching for it: adult themes!) I doubt it'll catch on.
Oh my god, my sides hurt. That was amazing hahaha
Not enough lensflare 0/10 would not watch again

I think your name describes my reaction...

Not going to watch that again.
I could see it maybe... perhaps if they replaced all the "f*ck"s with "screw"s.
Loved it! Get a grip people, it's just swearing. Very funny!

That was awesome. Here's the joke for those who don't get it. First this is a play on Call of Duty and Battlefield 3 'skill' videos which usually feature dubstep and all the camera spins and junk you see in the video. It's become a MASSIVE CLICHE to the point where people parody it.

Second, lithobraking is hilarious and very KSP.

Lithobraking? Is that like aerobraking but where instead of the atmosphere you use the rocky surface of a planet or moon to slow yourself down? Because if so, I do that a lot.
